title: OfficeSuite Pro 7 (PDF & HD) v7.3.1509
description:
The worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s No. 1 mobile office today!

# Installed on over 120 million devices in 205 countries
# Over 40,000 registrations per day
# No. 1 app in Google Play Business category
# 15 million downloads and over 15,000 reviews on Google Play

Made by MobiSystems, OfficeSuite Pro allows you to view, create, edit, print and share Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint files on the go. You can also open attachments and see PDF files on an Android based phone or tablet with our feature-rich mobile office solution.

OfficeSuite Pro includes a File Browser and integration with Cloud service leaders: Box, DropBox, Google Drive, SkyDrive and SugarSync to give users a multitude of options on how to manage files and attachments.

A number of manufacturers such as Sony, Amazon, Barnes and Noble, Coby, Alcatel, Archos, Pandigital, Polaroid, ViewSonic, Kyocera and Kobo trusted MobiSystems and preloaded OfficeSuite worldwide.

--- What is New in Version 7.3 ---

* Ability to create templates from Word, Excel and PowerPoint files.
* My templates folder in the File Browser Templates for user created templates.
* Ability to print with Google Cloud Print.
* Free hand drawing in Word documents.
* Ability to insert and delete table rows/columns in text documents. 
* Ability to insert and edit line shapes in text documents.
* Page setup in Word documents.
* Page background in text documents. 
* Charts supported in text documents.
* Language selector in Word documents via QuickSpell add-on (installed separately).
* Conditional formatting in Excel spreadsheets.
* Support of charts in PowerPoint documents.
* Transition audio for PPT and PPTX files.
* Free hand drawing in PowerPoint files.
* Improved Box cloud integration.

--- File Formats Supported ---

* Text format - Microsoft DOC, DOCX, DOCM, RTF, TXT, LOG
* Spreadsheet - Microsoft XLS, XLSX, XLSM, CSV 
* Presentation - Microsoft PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, PPTM, PPSM
* Other formats - Microsoft PDF, EML, ZIP
* Microsoft Office 365 compatible
